name: Mawa Kulfi Recipe | Zarnak Sidhwa | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Mawa Kulfi Recipe: Khoya, mawa or milk powder 1 /2 cup Condensed milk 1 can 400 gm Evaporated milk 1 can (16 oz) Cream 1-Â½ cups Kewra 1 tsp Bread slices 2 Crushed pistachios 2 tbsp Pistachios to garnish
instructions: Blend all the ingredients well and pour in kulfi moulds and freeze till set. Before serving take out from moulds and sprinkle more pistachios and serve.
